about_the_game:
Jock Studio is a Gay Dating Simulator following the story of Ace Anderson, an indecisive and aimless freshman at the prestigious all-boys sports campus, Olympus University. Having lived his life without purpose, Ace discovers it in the most unlikely of places.

Through a series of circumstances, Ace is invited to join a hidden film club, and discovers that it's not just any 'movie' production - it's a porn studio featuring the sexy jocks and athletes from around the campus!

Experience Ace's journey as a new member of the club, interacting with fellow actors, unraveling their stories, and forming meaningful connections that help Ace find his own purpose. Make the most of this unique college experience—an opportunity that comes only once in a lifetime!


Meet the cast of Jock Studio, featuring a wide variety of characters with different personalities, backgrounds, body types and more! With six potential partners to pursue, Ace will not only have the opportunity to 'make films' with these jocks, but also dive deeper into their unique and compelling personal stories!













Jock Studio's demo features a complete, playable prologue arc of the game with multiple branching paths, allowing Ace to meet and interact with each of his potential pursuable characters in their own 'intimate' settings, discovering who they are and what their personalities are like!

The demo features hand-drawn and fully rendered art from the main game, including intricate character sprites with multiple costumes, poses and expressions, detailed background arts that bring the campus of Olympus University to life, and multiple full scene arts, featuring special character moments as well as spicy fanservice and erotic scenes!



The demo additionally features fully and partially voiced scenes with added depth and emotion from a talented vocal cast! These voice performances are paired with a captivating soundtrack featuring original compositions to be included in the full game, completing the atmosphere and helping to immerse the players in their experience!

All of these features off an engaging and captivating experience, leaving the player to eagerly anticipate unraveling the full story and setting of Jock Studio in the full release!




Experience Ace's second semester at Olympus University and help discover his purpose through his membership at Jock Studio! Meet and pursue potential romantic interests in the other club members, learning their stories and forming connections with them, eventually leading to a variety of endings that change based on your choices!



Each character's sprite features multiples poses with a wide variety of costumes that fit each of the different settings in the game, alongside a large number of facial expressions to perfectly capture their emotions throughout the dialogue and scenes!



Immerse yourself further through cutscene illustrations depicting Ace and his pursuable characters in scenes that showcase emotional, entertaining, and memorable events in the story! Each scene art is drawn by hand and beautifully rendered, customized for every dialogue line to provide a more engaging storytelling experience. Stylish comic panels are also featured throughout the game to portray action and quirky scenes. Additionally, all images seen throughout the story will be viewable in a custom-made gallery for easy access at any time!



As a member of the Jock Studio club, you have the opportunity to assist in erotic film production by making choices as the director, and even have the option to participate with sexy, athletic actors! Work 'hard' to produce a new video every week to ensure the club remains funded!

Each erotic cutscene is beautifully hand-drawn, rendered and voice acted with certain scenes completely animated providing you with a complete and steamy viewing experience!



Dive into the world of Jock Studio with highly-custom and detailed background art that brings the campus of Olympus University to life, with multiple explorable locations and places to discover!



Explore Olympus University in more detail with an interactive campus map, but be sure to pay attention! Ace's explorations feature a stamina system that determines how many places he can visit, while the day & time system determines what events are available and the whereabouts of certain characters at specific times.

And when it comes to characters, choices are everything with the affection system! Be careful to treat each pursuable character in the proper way, so you can earn points and unlock your best endings!

Please note these features are not included in the demo and will be featured in the main game.


The game also features hand-picked fully voiced cutscenes that bring impactful moments and sexual scenarios to life with the vocal talents of our cast! The rest of the game is partially voiced, with charming voice clips that add flavor to each of the characters and further immerse the player in the story.

Accompanying the vocal performances is a fully original soundtrack created by our roster of talented composers! Comprising over 50 tracks, the soundtrack includes music for every location and time of the day, custom-made character themes for each pursuable interest, and more!

content_descriptors.notes:
Jock Studio's main plotline follows the character's experiences in a secretive pornographic film industry in a college setting, filming and partaking in adult films which features explicit nudity, sex, and bodily fluids.

In addition to the above, the characters will engage in various sexual scenarios, ranging from sexually explicit conversations, nudity, and eventual graphic sexual scenes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Jock Studio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIndows 7 and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Jock Studio is a gay dating simulator following the story of Ace Anderson, an indecisive & aimless freshman at the prestigious all-boys sports campus, Olympus University. Living his life without purpose, Ace discovers it in the most unlikely of places—the secret erotic filming club: Jock Studio!
